```sh
      # Local variable
MY_LOCAL="test"
bash -c 'echo $MY_LOCAL'  # Empty output

# Exported variable
export MY_EXPORTED="test"
bash -c 'echo $MY_EXPORTED'  # Shows "test" 

```

```sh
      validate_and_export() {
    if [ -n "$1" ] && [ -n "$2" ]; then
        export "$1"="$2"
        echo "Exported $1=$2"
    else
        echo "Error: Invalid arguments"
    fi
}

validate_and_export "API_KEY" "your-secret-key" 

```
